input_query: You plan to visit 4 European cities for 20 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 6 days in Valencia. You want to spend 6 days in Athens. You plan to visit relatives in Athens between day 1 and day 6. You would like to visit Naples for 5 days. You are going to attend a wedding in Naples between day 16 and day 20. You want to spend 6 days in Zurich. Here are the cities that have direct flights: Valencia and Naples, from Valencia to Athens, Athens and Naples, Zurich and Naples, Athens and Zurich, Zurich and Valencia. Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 20 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
